name: CORAZON-MD
description: This is a simple whatsapp bot built with nodejs and baileys with MD support.

PREFIX.description: choose your prefix for Corazon. To prevent errors and confusion you must set a prefix

DEV.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces "," Ex: 255683520005, 255624660205

API.description: add your heroku api key here to be able to control config varses directly in your pm

ANTICALL.description: Type yes if you want the bot to decline unnecessary calls

PM_PERMIT.description: Type yes if you want the bot to deny requests in your pm

ANTI_BAD_WORD.description: Type yes if you want bot to automatically detect bad words and remove or block in your pm

CODE.description: Enter your country code without +. Example: 255 for Tanzania. This will allow bot to detect and remove foreigners if commanded

BOTNAME.description: Enter name for your bot,,you can change this.

GC_PRESENCE.description: Type yes if you want bot to show fake recording/typing in group chats.

SESSION.description: Paste the session id that you received in whatsapp after linking the bot. It's used for authentication.

AUTOVIEW_STATUS.description: Type yes if you want bot to automatically read all status update

EVENTS.description: choose whether to allow bot to detect events in groups such as promote, demote, remove and add. If set to true bot will send welcome/goodbye messages and signal when somebody is promoted or demoted.

AUTOBIO.description: Type yes if you want bot to autoupdate it's bio constantly

ANTITAG.description: Type yes if you want bot to automatically remove members who tagall or use hidetag.

ANTILINK.description: Type yes if you want bot to automatically remove members who send link.

AUTOREACT.description: Type yes if you want bot to automatically react to messages

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Type yes if you want bot to automatically like status updates, this will only work if AUTOVIEW_STATUS is yes.

AUTOREAD.description: Put here yes if you want bot to automatically bluetick messages in private.

WA_PRESENCE.description: This is your WhatsApp Presence Status: Here's how to set it up: Type *typing* if you want bot to show typing..., Type *recording* if you want bot to show recording..., Type *online* if you want bot to be always online, Leave this field blank if you want bot to show your actual presence.

MODE.description: Type private if you don't want other people to use the bot or public if you want everyone to access.
